participant_1.name: Liam Carter
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about music, always seeking inspiration in nature.
participant_1.background: i started playing guitar when i was three. i grew up in the industry. we spent summers ringing at national parks. i'm a country music singer.

participant_2.name: Emma Thompson
participant_2.personality: Compassionate and hardworking, with a strong commitment to helping others.
participant_2.background: i work fulltime in a shipyard. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month. i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. my favorite color is navy blue.
